question: The Daulat Beg Oldie airstrip is located in which region?
explanation: Daulat Beg Oldi located in Ladakh lies near the easternmost point of the Karakoram Range in a cold desert region in the far north of India It is just 8 km south of the Chinese border and 9 km northwest of the Aksai Chin Line of Actual Control between China and India.
